sentences.english: The company boasts a lot of awards it received at international fairs.
sentences.chinese: 该公司在国际性会展上一举揽获数项大奖。

sentences.english: Can I have a look at that set of cloisonne ?
sentences.chinese: 我看看那套静态揽瓷器好么？

sentences.english: Eric had the luck to have close body contact with his female fans when they were playing games.
sentences.chinese: 孙耀威与女歌迷玩游戏时又搭膊头又揽腰，艳福不浅。

sentences.english: Iraq and the bosom embrace me, except I preexistence is frivolous.
sentences.chinese: 伊，揽我之怀，除我前世轻浮。

sentences.english: To quote Spider - Man's late uncle : "With great power comes great responsibility."
sentences.chinese: 正如蜘蛛侠的最新名言“揽大权者担重任。”

sentences.english: You're lucky that I've held this up for you.
sentences.chinese: 你很幸福，因为我把一切都揽下了。

sentences.english: She went to the trouble of shortening the trousers for her younger brother.
sentences.chinese: 她自动揽下了把她弟弟的裤子改小的任务。

sentences.english: Instead, put the burden on yourself.
sentences.chinese: 反之，要把责任揽在你自己身上。

sentences.english: Hug her from behind when sleeping with her enfolded and feeling like a baby.
sentences.chinese: 从背后抱着她睡觉，像孩子一样揽在怀里。

sentences.english: He rides up on a big stallion, sweeps her into his arms.
sentences.chinese: 他骑着一匹健壮的牡马冲上去，将她揽在怀中。
